dashboard.description: A vertical scrolling path where lessons are circular nodes floating among clouds. Background changes color as user scrolls up (Dawn -> Day -> Dusk -> Space).

marketing.description: Large hero section with floating 3D elements. Feature sections use bento-grid layout with rounded corners and colorful backgrounds.

images.description: Colorful hot air balloon in sky - Represents the 'Stratos' ascent theme.
images.usage: Landing page hero background or main visual.

icons.custom_svgs: Use simple SVG shapes for 'Gems', 'Hearts', 'Fire' (Streak) if libraries lack the specific gamified look.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text on colored buttons is White or Dark Slate. Avoid light text on yellow.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible ring-4 ring-sky-200 on all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. TAILWIND CONFIG: Update tailwind.config.js to include the new colors (sky, indigo, yellow) and font families (Nunito, Outfit).
3. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: Heavily customize Shadcn components. Remove the default 'radius-md' and 'border-input' look. Make everything rounded-2xl or 3xl.
4. GAMIFICATION FIRST: Always display the User's Streak, XP, and Hearts in the top navigation bar.
5. PATH LAYOUT: For the Dashboard, do not use a standard table or grid. Build a custom 'Path' component where lesson nodes are connected by SVG lines.
6. USE IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs for the Landing Page. Do not use placeholders.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all buttons, inputs, and lesson options.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
